ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Quickstrike: Quickstrike stumbled, and his body couldn t hold him up any longer. He landed on his chest, supported by his arms. He groaned in pain and squinted

Quickstrike:







Quickstrike stumbled, and his body couldn't hold him up any longer. He 
landed on his chest, supported by his arms. He groaned in pain and squinted 
his brightly glowing crimson eyes. He stared down at the ground, trying to 
think how he was going to get himself out of this. How he was going to get 
his repairs. He could always sneek himself into the Predacons base. The ship 
would never warn Hell Beast and his troops that he was coming.

He turned himself on his back and looked at his horrific leg. He tilted his 
head back until it almost touched the plate behind him. He was about to 
scream, but he forced himself not to. He couldn't warn anybody that he was 
here. He was alone again, scared, wounded, and skittish on who would come to 
kill him. The pain on his body made him feel like he would pass out. He dug 
the fangs on this left hand into the ground. He uttered a strange sound that 
sounded like a growl.

Why did that slag have to shoot his leg? Why couldn't he have gone for 
something else?

Somebody help, he called out into his mind, but knew no one could hear him. 
But maybe the clone of Tarantsulus could. So he called out into the ambient 
of his mind: Transulas, get yer keister out here!

He stayed by the trees, knowing if he was out in the open he would be 
killed.
